Uses of Class
exceptions.QwirkleException

  • Packages that use QwirkleException 
    Package Description
    exceptions  

    • Uses of QwirkleException in exceptions

      Subclasses of QwirkleException in exceptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlreadyChallengedSomeoneException
      This exception is thrown whenever someone tries to challenge someone while they already challenge someone else.
      class  HandLimitReachedExeption
      Exception can be thrown whener one tries to add more stones in a hand than allowed.
      class  IllegalMoveException
      This exception is thrown when a the player wants to play a move that is not according to the game rules.
      class  IllegalTurnException
      This exception can be thrown whenever a turn is illegal.
      class  NotInGameException
      This exception can be thrown whenever a players tries to do something whilst he isn't in a game.
      class  NotYourTurnException
      This exception tells you that it is not your turn, silly.
      class  PlayerAlreadyInGameException
      This exception can be thrown if a player is added to the same game twice.
      class  PlayerCannotBeChallengedException
      This exception is thrown whenever a player that does not support challenges or is otherwise not challangeble on this moment.
      class  PlayerIsNoChallengeeException
      Thrown when a challange is accepted by someone who was not challenged.
      class  SquareOutOfBoundsException
      This exception is thrown when a square outside the game board is being accessed.
      class  TileNotInBagException
      This exception is thrown whenever something tries to take something out of the bag that isn't in it.
      class  TileNotInHandException
      When the tile is not in hand, this exception will be thrown.
      class  TooFewTilesInBagException
      This exception is thrown when more tiles are being requested from the bag than are in it.
      class  TooManyPlayersException
      This exception can be thrown if a game is attempted to start with too many players.
      class  TooManyTilesInBag
      This exception can be thrown when there are too many tiles in the bag.
